website_summaries.verdict: Excellent warmth for all terrain that will pack light.
pros: Side panels add breathability for outdoor pursuits in cold weather

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful layering piece
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Suitable for cool weather as outer layer and for layering under heavier pieces when cold. Breathes well and quality construction throughout- sleeves are wonderful and fully articulated for full range of motion. There is nothing I don't like about this piece but some of the colors- I have it in a few colors but find I wear the black nearly exclusively. I find I need the atom ar for temps below 30.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Best coat I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Best coat I've ever owned. Lightweight yet warm, easy to clean, and rain repellent. Traveled up the inside passage of Alaska and along the Aleutian Island chain where they get plenty of misty rainy weather and had no issues staying dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: HeliFlyer

customer_reviews.title: I use it almost everyday for winter and spring.
customer_reviews.text: Arcteryx is a wonderful brand and to get it at this price?... What a steal!!! The color is cute and this jacket keeps me warm when needed or makes me be at a comfortable state if it's just in between warm and a bit cold. I would order more in another color if I didn't already have 8 jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Truong

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket rocks! It's made for heavy aerobic activity in cool to cold temps and it does it's job well! I have taken it running so far when it was in the 30s and windy and it was great. Light and comfortable. I can't wait to take it hiking. The fit is pretty trim and athletic as it's meant to be more of an under-layer in a layering system for colder temps.
customer_reviews.author: Anirudh Dharmarajan

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket, it's very figure flattering and light. This brand seems to run small. I'm 5'3" and usually a size 4 and I bought the medium. I also have the nuclei hoody which fits similarly.
customer_reviews.author: estavrou

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! Its my second one. Its warm and provides good wind protection when doing outdoor activities. Its also perfect for rock climbing outside on cool weather days - you can move your arms around without any restriction in movement. I noticed with this jacket the zip was not so smooth when doing it up - no problems now, but I hope it doesn't mean it will be a problem in the future. Most of my arc'teryx jackets have lasted 4-5 years with pretty continuous use, I have found that the zip is the first bit to break every time.
customer_reviews.author: emily harding

customer_reviews.title: If u are like me always cold on the plane
customer_reviews.text: It is very lightweight and very warm. I wore it on the plane. It packed very small. If u are like me always cold on the plane, this will be your best carry on jacket. I bought it on sale so not a lot of color options left. The roseberry is pretty and looks just like in pic.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa W.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I wish Amazon would,wait awhile before,asking for reviews. I think I love this jacket. It fits just fine. I usually order size small, but went with medium after reading others comments. It will be ok with a sweater underneath. Can't comment on washing or cleaning. I haven't worn it yet. I bought it because it was a great price and a very nice color. and my husband has a similar jacket and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Econana

customer_reviews.title: My favorite jacket of all time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife with the hood. I have the men's version without a hood. This jacket is ultra light, and comfortable for cold or cool whether. It cuts the wind on front and back panels, and has breathable stretch on the sides. It can be used for high intensity outdoors and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket and well made!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits as expected, well made, color is great, thought it would be super warm but works best layered for really cold days. If you are purchasing for extreme cold activities it must be used as a layer it is definitely not warm enough in 15 degree weather as a stand alone. Would recommend buying as a great all around coat.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Weight-Warmth Ratio
customer_reviews.text: Weight to warmth ratio is unbeatable; packs down incredibly small into the hood. I've worn it as a layer hiking in the negatives and stayed plenty warm. I've even worn it, unexpectedly, as a rain jacket several times, and it repels water with ease. Even though the hood doesn't have a draw string for a tighter fit in windy conditions, I've never had issues with my hood staying on as long as the zipper is up all the way. The rip resistant fabric withstood rock climbing on cold days, too. The only downside is that it runs small around the hips.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Commender

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. For generally mild Colorado winters, it is perfect. On a terribly windy day about 36 degrees, it kept me warm with just a couple base layers underneath above tree line for a day of hiking. Good wind resistance, breathable. The hood also has good coverage, kept my face covered around goggles. I bought it a little roomie to account for a few layers underneath and the large was great for my 5'8" height. Quality workmanship and materials. Very light and packs down small in a backpack. I also love the cuff design.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Really light and very warm. I use it on my runs particularly in the morning and it is perfect for warmth and flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. So pretty. Fit is great. I'd say buy your usual size. Keeps me nice and warm on cool days. Rolls small to fit into the pack. Great as a mid layer when needing more. Yeah!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Gaddy

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this jacket! It’s warm on all but the coldest days and it’s not bulky at all. Probably not ideal to wear a heavy sweater under it as the arms are a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: kmonaco

customer_reviews.title: Jacket was amazing! Only thing is I ordered a large and ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket was amazing! Only thing is I ordered a large and felt a bit too fitted. I prefer a bit looser in case I'd like to wear a sweater. I'm a size 10/12 and large felt a bit smaller definitely would have gone with a size up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. It is very light and very warm. Even windproof. It's my new favorite for hiking - and then when I get home I still don't want to take it off. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: p2E

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and fit
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Perfect fit. Great color. You can't tell you have this on because it's so light. It doesn't have a slim look if you are looking for that, but for a light cover, this would be perfect. Great deal too.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coat!
customer_reviews.text: This coat has both performance and good looks going for it. It's not waterproof, but rain does bead up on it keeping you dry for a good period of time. It's warm, especially condisering it's not very thick. The cut is very flattering, as well as functional--not much to get in your way during your outdoor adventures. I also love the cuffs; they're stretchy and fit snugly, contributing to warmth but moving along with you. This coat also makes a great insulating layer if you spring for an Arcteryx shell. With that combo, you're pretty much set for any kind of weather.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Price

customer_reviews.title: Warm layer for fall & travel!
customer_reviews.text: Able to move unrestricted in this jacket. Great packing item for travel. This jacket allows me to be ready for any kind of weather.
customer_reviews.author: oegeo

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Very useful in a variety of weather. Form fitting , great hood and pack able It thinks differently .
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: The price was great nearly 100 dollars off and you just can't beat ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my girlfriend so she'd stop stealing mine. The price was great nearly 100 dollars off and you just can't beat Arc'teryx quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gathings

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: verygood! i am very like it,I will continue to buy!Don't say anything else!Minato words, my English is not good!god please!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sunxiao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing jacket-perfect layer for cold days and great by itself on moderate days. Awesome color as well!
customer_reviews.author: mad hatter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Provides a lot of water resistance and is very cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, flattering jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and quality of my Arcteryx Atom Hoody. The jackets seem to run small; I'm 5'6," 135 lbs, and flat-chested, and my medium is none-too-roomy, but I like the flattering, fitted shape. I only need a T-shirt underneath. The stitching, seams, and stretchy cuffs are nicely done. I like the close-fitting hood. It's quite rain-resistant and very lightweight. The jacket is attractive enough for wear around town. I bought it for fall hiking, but I usually heat up too much. It will be a nice layer over a long-sleeved T-shirt this winter.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent midlayer
customer_reviews.text: I wore my Atom LT for a five day rim-to-rim hike of the Grand Canyon over Christmas. It was warm yet breathable--I had it on for the majority of the hike. It fit comfortably under my pack and still gave me access to the pockets for my gloves. It also served as a great insulating layer under my hard shell jacket at night in camp and rarely felt cold.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Pena

customer_reviews.title: A bit lighter weight than what I expected, but so nice.
customer_reviews.text: A bit lighter weight than what I expected, which was to be able to wear it when I wasn't skiing or snowshoeing, or doing otherwise strenuous activities. But very very comfortable. Well made. I returned my Mammut jackets to get this and the Stingray shell. For the same price as Mammut, I got double the quality with Arc'teryx.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Arc'teryx is absolutely a great brand. The jacket is super light, but can keep the body fairly warm given its weight. And the hoody is extremely useful as you'd never forget to bring it out and it works better than wear another hat. A must-have company for a trip to cold area.
customer_reviews.author: Hao Pan

customer_reviews.title: Arcteryx Atom LT Hoody
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift and my daughter-in-law just loves it. It's great for layering when they go out skiing and snowshoeing. Very light but keeps the wind and cold away.
customer_reviews.author: Astute Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: under a shell or on its own! I have used it and washed it and used it... No complaints about the quality and I always get compliments on the colour.
customer_reviews.author: Freda

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is attractive, lightweight, yet warm.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is attractive, lightweight, yet warm. I was wearing it on top of my merino wool baselayer & midlayer inside and at average temperature of -5 C, it was comfortable. I needed something extra when night fall, but I was surprised that this jacket kept me warm in the day time. It is possible to squeeze the entire jacket into one of the sleeves. The Pink Guava colour is gorgeous and truly stands out.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sng

customer_reviews.title: This has become by far my favorite jacket. It is fairly thin and packable
customer_reviews.text: This has become by far my favorite jacket. It is fairly thin and packable, and the sides are a stretchy material that allows heat to pass through. I have found it keeps in the perfect amount of heat for cool autumn and spring days, and doesn't make me too hot when paired with an outer jacket for winter. It runs slim through the sides and the stretchy wrist bands run small. There is no visible wear after one year of regular use, and the fill has maintained its loft.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older one which I wore to death. Light but warm. Packs down to nothing. Go to piece of mid layer!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this insulated jacket. It is very light but it's very warm. Perfect for the travelling in Spring and late Fall. Perfect for night wearing when peopel camp.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mid layer!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Arc'teryx jacket. I love the color and the material is very high quality. I plan on buying a shell to go over this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nanton-cacnio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for skiing, base layers, etc. It's my favorite jack and I guarantee it will be yours! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: really love it!
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for my girlfriend. She love it very much! very thin but wind proof !during -10degree it still keep warm!
customer_reviews.author: zhang/ping

customer_reviews.title: Best Jacket Ever, Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: As I recall, the reviews for this product were on par and convinced me to spend the money on this jacket. So I am writing another to confirm the fact that you NEED to buy this jacket. It's seriously the best. Love, a Montanan.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome jacket. bought it having never trying one on or seeing one in person and I am SO glad I did. lightweight, comfortable and very warm. My favorite jacket I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: G3RM4NDR1V3N

customer_reviews.title: I was recommended this product by a mountaineering friend who used this ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money!! I was recommended this product by a mountaineering friend who used this as a layering piece when climbing Mt. Rainier.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: smells like it has been siting in storage for a long ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, light and warm. It came with an odor, smells like it has been siting in storage for a long time. Hope that will go away soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: This coat is super light weight, warm and breathable! I bought it because my boyfriend has one he lives in and I'm always chilled indoors and out. I will never go back! I'm always just warm enough, not to cold(unless outside in -15 degree weather or something) and i don't seem to get to hot either! It's comfortable enough to wear lounging around the house but also looks sleek and flattering when I want to go out. The only down side is now me and my boyfriend always match because we both want to live in these coats!
customer_reviews.author: Kyrie

customer_reviews.title: Groovy cool colours, light weight & toasty warm!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous jacket. Light in weight. Groovy cool colours & it does fit itself right inside the sleeve if yu needed a pillow for example! great base layer jacket. Your pals wont loose you in these funky colours! One drawback; priced at $250 - that's just a bit much. I found my online cheaper, but not cheap enough. I'd like another one tho - later when sales happen.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Atom LT = Legit
customer_reviews.text: I have one myself and I also gave one to my girlfriend and it is now her favorite jacket ever! It's only been one week and she tells me that she gets compliments from random people all the time. Also, it's actually perfectly warm and breathable! Just right for Bay Area weather. It feels super high quality and light! The zipper is amazing and the cuffs are CRAZY! They are the most comfortable but weather tight cuffs we've ever felt! Amazing! Best semi-light but warm jacket you can find. I tried multiple Northface and Patagonia jackets similar to the Atom and none compare.
customer_reviews.author: P. Aubin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is inexplicably warm for how thin it is! I wore it out with only a long sleeve shirt underneath, in low single digit weather, and didn't feel a thing (though I was walking so that helps). It's pretty wind proof and waterproof, I tested it in medium-heavy rain. The hood is key, it keeps you warm and dry. For some strange reason, it's not too hot to wear this on a 50 degree day either. I also love the tapered cuffs that keep out wind! I'm so happy with my purchase that I got one for my husband and one for my dad as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking Light

customer_reviews.title: but it's good middle level in winter
customer_reviews.text: It's a little small for my wife.but it's good middle level in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Li Yan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was shipped timely. We had to return it (medium size) because it was small for my daughter. It actually fit me (small) but didn't have room for extra layers inside. The fit looked nice though and it was well made.
customer_reviews.author: MMaliksi
